official_title: A joint resolution to provide for the designation of September as "National Sickle Cell Month".

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to designate the month of September as "National Sickle Cell Month."

titles.title: A joint resolution to provide for the designation of September as "National Sickle Cell Month".
